data.title: Who is Holly Marie Combs' husband, Mike Ryan?
data.meta_description: HOLLY Marie Combs landed her breakout gig in the 90s when she took on the role of Kimberly Brock in the hit series, Picket Fences.Throughout her caree
data.text:
HOLLY Marie Combs landed her breakout gig in the 90s when she took on the role of Kimberly Brock in the hit series, Picket Fences.

Throughout her career, Combs has been married three times â€” here's everything we know about her latest husband, Mike Ryan.

Who is Holly Marie Combs?

Holly Marie Combs is an American actress born on December 3, 1973, in San Diego, California.

Combs received her first acting credit at 14 years old in the 1988 film, Sweet Hearts Dance.

However, it wasn't until 1992 that Combs booked her first breakout role as Kimberly Brock in the CBS TV series, Picket Fences.

After the show ended, Combs went on to play Piper in the series Charmed alongside actresses Shannen Doherty, Alyssa Milano, and Rose McGowan.

After eight seasons, the show was canceled when the WB merged to become the CW.

Nonetheless, Holly continued to book gigs as she appeared in the TV series Pretty Little Liars as Ella Montgomery.

Who is Holly Marie Combs' husband, Mike Ryan?

Mike Ryan is a Los Angeles-based restauranteur.

He and Combs met at his restaurant Xoc in 2016 and immediately hit it off.

Speaking with People, Combs said: "Our connection was so immediate. Just when I stopped looking for the perfect person, the perfect person showed up."

The couple, who have kids from previous relationships, said they wanted to take their time as they have their kids to take into account.

As per the outlet, Combs said: "We had both come to the point in our lives where we were very dedicated to our kids, and okay with the fact that we would probably raise them as single parents.

"We went on proper dates. We courted for quite a while. We both have kids so we were careful and cautious and slow."

After a year of dating, the two got engaged in 2017.

In September 2019, the two tied the knot in an outdoor ceremony in Carmel, California.

Was Holly Marie Combs married previously?

Prior to Mike Ryan, Holly Marie Combs was married twice.

In 1993, Combs married former actor Bryan Travis Smith. The two were married for four years before calling it quits in 1997.

It wasn't until February 2004 that Combs married David W. Donoho, who worked in the camera and electrical department on the set of Charmed.

Together they welcomed three sons: Finley, Riley, and Kelley.

The two were married for nearly eight years before divorcing in November 2011.
